name: TVDigitEntryViewController
desc: A view controller that enables the user to enter digits, like a passcode, in your app.

items.name: var titleText: String?
items.desc: The title of the digit entry view.

items.name: var promptText: String?
items.desc: A prompt that displays any additional required information.

items.name: var isSecureDigitEntry: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether an entered digit is immediately obscured.

items.name: var entryCompletionHandler: (String) -> Void
items.desc: A completion handler that cues the app that the user has entered the required number of digits for the digit entry view.

items.name: func clearEntry(animated: Bool)
items.desc: Removes all digits from the digit entry view.
